item.title: Sagittarius Horoscope for Thursday, February 13, 2014
item.description: You find yourself fighting the voice of authority. You are surprised when you realize that your legs have tensed from your brain`s fight-or-flight messages. Whatever you do, resist the urge to run away from your problems. Embrace the logical understanding that it`s better to face a problematic situation than to flee from it. A moment of laughter returns lightness to your feet. You feel a sense of relief when you realize there is another option.
